required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: ACH04 to Assess the Safety and Tolerability in Healthy Adults Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label, Dose Escalation Study of ACH04 to Assess the Safety and Tolerability in Healthy Adults Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This study intends to provide information on the safety and tolerability of repeated oral doses of ACH04. A phase I, single-center, first in human, open-label, dose escalation study of ACH04 to assess the safety and tolerability in healthy adults subjects is selected to best address the study goals.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the safety of rising multiple doses of ACH04
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the occurrence of adverse events, Assess safety through laboratory tests and Assess safety through electrocardiogram

intervention.description: The subjects will receive the study medication in each group
